analog_hub package

analog-hub: Dependency management for analog IC design repositories.

Core Modules

analog_hub.core package

Core business logic for analog-hub.

analog_hub.core.extractor module

Path extraction operations for analog-hub.

class analog_hub.core.extractor.PathExtractor(project_root=PosixPath('.'))[source]

Bases: object

Manages selective path extraction from mirrors to project directories.

__init__(project_root=PosixPath('.'))[source]

Initialize path extractor.

Parameters:

project_root (Path) – Root directory of the project (default: current directory)

extract_library(library_name, import_spec, mirror_path, library_root, repo_hash, resolved_commit)[source]

Extract library from mirror to local project directory.

Parameters:

  • library_name (str) – Name/key of the library import

  • import_spec (ImportSpec) – Import specification (repo, ref, source_path, local_path)

  • mirror_path (Path) – Path to mirror directory containing cloned repository

  • library_root (str) – Default library root directory

  • repo_hash (str) – SHA256 hash of repository URL

  • resolved_commit (str) – Resolved commit hash

Return type:

ExtractionState

Returns:

ExtractionState with local path and checksum

Raises:

  • FileNotFoundError – If source_path doesn’t exist in mirror

  • OSError – If file operations fail

validate_library(library_path)[source]

Validate installed library and return its checksum.

Parameters:

library_path (Path) – Path to installed library directory

Return type:

Optional[str]

Returns:

Checksum if valid, None if library doesn’t exist

remove_library(library_path)[source]

Remove installed library.

Parameters:

library_path (Path) – Path to installed library

Return type:

bool

Returns:

True if library was removed, False if it didn’t exist

list_installed_libraries(library_root)[source]

List all installed libraries.

Parameters:

library_root (str) – Root directory to search for libraries

Return type:

Dict[str, Path]

Returns:

Dictionary mapping library names to their paths

calculate_library_checksum(library_path)[source]

Calculate checksum for an existing library installation.

Parameters:

library_path (Path) – Path to installed library

Return type:

Optional[str]

Returns:

Checksum if successful, None if failed

analog_hub.core.installer module

Installation orchestration for analog-hub.

Bases: Exception

Raised when installation operations fail.

Bases: object

Orchestrates mirror and extraction operations for library installation.

Initialize library installer.

Parameters:

  • project_root (Path) – Root directory of the project

  • mirror_root (Path) – Root directory for repository mirrors

load_config()[source]

Load analog-hub.yaml configuration.

Return type:

AnalogHubConfig

load_lock_file()[source]

Load or create lock file.

Return type:

LockFile

save_lock_file(lock_file)[source]

Save lock file to disk.

Return type:

None

install_library(library_name, import_spec, library_root, existing_entry=None)[source]

Install a single library.

Parameters:

  • library_name (str) – Name of the library to install

  • import_spec (ImportSpec) – Import specification from configuration

  • library_root (str) – Default library root directory

  • existing_entry (Optional[LockEntry]) – Optional existing lock entry for timestamp preservation during updates

Return type:

LockEntry

Returns:

LockEntry for the installed library

Raises:

InstallationError – If installation fails

install_all(library_names=None, force=False)[source]

Install all libraries or specific subset with smart skip logic.

Parameters:

  • library_names (Optional[List[str]]) – Optional list of specific libraries to install. If None, installs all libraries from configuration.

  • force (bool) – If True, force reinstall even if libraries are up-to-date. If False, skip libraries that are already installed at correct version.

Return type:

Dict[str, LockEntry]

Returns:

Dictionary mapping library names to their lock entries (only changed libraries)

Raises:

InstallationError – If any installation fails

list_installed_libraries()[source]

List all currently installed libraries.

Return type:

Dict[str, LockEntry]

Returns:

Dictionary mapping library names to their lock entries

validate_installation()[source]

Validate current installation state.

Return type:

Tuple[List[str], List[str]]

Returns:

Tuple of (valid_libraries, invalid_libraries)

clean_unused_mirrors()[source]

Remove unused mirrors not referenced by any installed library.

Return type:

List[str]

Returns:

List of removed mirror directories

Initialize mirror manager.

Parameters:

  • mirror_root (Path) – Root directory for all mirrors (default: .mirror)

  • git_timeout (int) – Timeout for git operations in seconds (default: 60)

Parameters:

Return type:

bool

Returns:

True if mirror directory exists with valid git repo

get_mirror_commit(repo_url)[source]

Get current commit for existing mirror.

Parameters:

repo_url (str) – Repository URL

Return type:

Optional[str]

Returns:

Current commit hash if mirror exists, None otherwise

create_mirror(repo_url, ref='main')[source]

Create new mirror by cloning repository.

Parameters:

  • repo_url (str) – Repository URL to clone

  • ref (str) – Git reference to checkout (branch, tag, or commit)

Return type:

MirrorState

Returns:

MirrorState for the created mirror

Raises:

  • git.GitCommandError – If git operations fail

  • OSError – If file system operations fail

update_mirror(repo_url, ref)[source]

Update existing mirror or create new one with smart git operations.

Parameters:

  • repo_url (str) – Repository URL

  • ref (str) – Git reference to checkout

Return type:

MirrorState

Returns:

Updated MirrorState

analog_hub.utils package

Utility functions and helpers.

analog_hub.utils.checksum module

Checksum calculation utilities for analog-hub.

This module provides centralized checksum operations for: - Directory content validation - File content validation - Repository URL hashing

class analog_hub.utils.checksum.ChecksumCalculator[source]

Bases: object

Centralized checksum calculation utilities.

static calculate_directory_checksum(directory)[source]

Calculate SHA256 checksum of directory contents.

Parameters:

directory (Path) – Directory to checksum

Return type:

str

Returns:

Hex string of SHA256 checksum, empty string if directory doesn’t exist

static calculate_file_checksum(file_path)[source]

Calculate SHA256 checksum of a single file.

Parameters:

file_path (Path) – Path to file to checksum

Return type:

str

Returns:

Hex string of SHA256 checksum, empty string if file doesn’t exist

static normalize_repo_url(repo_url)[source]

Normalize repository URL for consistent hashing.

Parameters:

repo_url (str) – Repository URL in various formats

Return type:

str

Returns:

Normalized URL string

static generate_repo_hash(repo_url)[source]

Generate SHA256 hash for repository URL.

Parameters:

repo_url (str) – Repository URL

Return type:

str

Returns:

16-character hex hash (first 64 bits of SHA256)
